thread.title: The Best New Way to Get Custom Sneakers
thread.title_full: The Best New Way to Get Custom Sneakers -- The Cut

author: Lindsay Peoples
title: The Best New Way to Get Custom Sneakers
text:
Photo: Farfetch
Sneakerheads already know that SWEAR has some of the best designer sneakers for men and women, but now that they've partnered with Farfetch , the custom-sneaker game has changed for the better. MYSWEAR is the world's first purveyor of online luxury footwear customization. It combines state-of-the-art 3-D modeling technology with artisanal Portuguese craftsmanship so you actually get what you want — and get your money's worth.
Simple trainers are nice and all, but here you can play with over 16 different silhouettes and over 80 combinations of the finest materials and colorways: from luxe nappa leathers to ethically sourced exotic skins like python, ostrich, and crocodile. With a shipping time of four weeks, it's hard to resist. Prices start at $385 and are available today on Farfetch.
Photo: Farfetch Photo: Farfetch
